programme.title: Fright Knight - Episode 105
programme.desc: Using the Book of Fear, Jestro calls forth Whipperella and uses her to trap the knights in the dark woods where they realize their darkest fears. Searching through the dark forests of the realm, Jestro finds "The Book of Fear." It's pretty scary. But he feeds it to the book of Book of Monsters, and he uses it to call forth WHIPPERELLA, a monster that can induce fear. One-by-one she uses her "knighmarish" power on the knights and they experiences their own worst fears. Clay fears not living up to the Knights' Code. Lance fears being a nobody. Macy fears never being a knight and Axl fears having no food. Aaron must take the lead because he's fearless he does everything with reckless abandon. It's not until he leads the group out of the forest - as they fight off the Whipperella - that they we find out Aaron's true fear - the fear of peace and quiet and no more challenges or high energy escapades.

programme.title: Emma's Dilemma - Episode 5
programme.desc: When Stephanie becomes obsessed with beating her rival Tanya in a float building contest and accidentally disregards Emma's ideas and design, Tanya convinces Emma to join her team to get revenge on Stephanie. When the girls enter a float-building contest, Emma is especially excited to share her design idea for the float. But no one is listening to her, especially Stephanie, who's become obsessed with beating her rival Tanya in the contest. Emma finally does find someone who appreciates her design... Tanya! Tanya convinces Emma to join her team to build the float design. But is Tanya just using Emma to get revenge on Stephanie?

programme.title: Tick Tock
programme.desc: When the four ninja follow the mysterious falcon into the woods, they stumble on a hidden work shop where Zane learns the secret about his past and in the process, finally knowing who he is, he is the first ninja to unlock his true potential.

programme.title: The Golden Castle - Episode 106
programme.desc: When Lance is cast as the star in the new remake of the classic movie "Ned Knightly and the Golden Castle" he doesn't anticipate Jestro and his monsters invading the set and ruining his starring role. It's movie time! Lance does something very Lance: he agrees to star in a movie about remake of a classic film in Knighton: "The Golden Castle." While pillaging a village, Jestro and the Book of Monsters see a movie poster for "The Golden Castle" and the book says the legendary Golden Castle is filled with riches! Jestro explains that it's just a dumb movie and that it's not real. It's all based on a "script." The Book, who's been shelved for many years, wants to eat the movie script to learn more about the modern world. On the set of the movie, Lance has invited the other Knights to act as extras. When they see how Lance is being portrayed, they're incensed. When Jestro attacks the movie set to get the script for his book to eat, the film director keeps rolling. This battle footage is fantastic! The Knights defeat Jestro even though the movie set is trashed. The director will make it work. At the premier of the movie, Lance is embarrassed to see that he's been reduced to comic relief for the realm's bravest Knight...Macy! The director has now made her a star.

programme.title: Friends Of The Jungle - Episode 6
programme.desc: When Olivia's Aunt Sophie is getting married and the groom has gone missing in the jungle, the girls fly out to the jungle in secret to try to find him in time for the wedding. The girls are super excited to be planning a wedding for Olivia's Aunt Sophie. There's just one little problem: Olivia learns that the groom has gone missing in the jungle while working at an animal rescue station! Not wanting to worry her aunt, Olivia, Stephanie and Mia secretly fly to the jungle to try and find the groom, Henry, rescuing a few animals along the way. Too bad Emma and Andrea couldn't keep the secret back in Heartlake City. Now, Sophie, Emma and Andrea join the others in the jungle to try and find Henry before the rapidly approaching wedding date!

programme.title: Once Bitten, Twice Shy
programme.desc: Jay and Nya have to cut their first date in Mega-Monster Amusement Park short as the Serpentine are on their way to retrieve the first or four fang blades to be used to awaken the Great Devourer.

programme.title: The Maze Of Amazement - Episode 107
programme.desc: The Knights find themselves trapped in a maze looking for the Book of Deception. But will they actually get their hands on it, or will it keep deceiving them? The Knights travel to the Hill Country in the northern part of Knighton to Axl's home town of DIGGINGTON (where they realize that all of Axl's family look just like him.) While they're there, Merlok 2.0 detects something...one of the Magic Books! It's "The Book of Deception." They go to find it and discover it ended up under a mountain. And, to make matters worse, the magic book has built a maze around itself to keep it from being found (it is deceptive!) As the NEXO-Knights enter the maze from one side, Jestro enters from the other the Book of Monsters has led him to the maze to get The Book of Deception, too. It's a race through this confusing maze to see who can get the book first. Ava figures out the maze is the Whackman maze from a videogame. After help from Axl's people to defeat Jestro and win the book, the knights discover it's a FAKE BOOK of deception. The Book of Deception created a fake copy of itself!

programme.title: Andrea's Big Moment - Episode 7
programme.desc: When famous pop star Livi comes to Heartlake City to judge a talent show, our five friends Olivia, Mia, Andrea, Emma and Stephanie all decide to enter - and one of them, in particular, really wants to win but faces some serious challenge from an old rival. A talent show has come to Heartlake City and all the girls enter the talent competition hoping to impress the judges, especially their idol, pop star Chloe. No one wants a shot at stardom more than Andrea, which is why the other girls are surprised when she doesn't show up to practice before the first round of the competition. Very nearly eliminated prior to the big show, Andrea panics and throws herself into an intense practice-training mode, even shutting her friends out when they're trying to help her with her performance. Just moments before her live TV debut, Andrea realizes she's missing a key element to her act. Can she pull it off without her friends? And are the other girls willing to help after being pushed away?

programme.title: The Royal Blacksmiths
programme.desc: The four ninja go undercover as a dance troupe and enter a talent contest in their quest to win "The Blade Cup" where one of the fang blades is hidden.

programme.title: The Black Knight - Episode 108
programme.desc: It seems the NEXO-Knights are attacking villages throughout the realm! But why? A mysterious Black Knight appears to defend the cities from the rogue NEXO-villains! Jestro, happy he has the REAL Book of Deception, uses it to create bad versions of the NEXO-Knights. The "fake" knights then attack villages and hamlets. When the real NEXO-Knights arrive, they're booed and pelted with food. Why does everyone hate them? To make matters more confusing, a giant Mech Suit in black - The BLACK KNIGHT - appears to defend the kingdom's villages from the fake knights. The Black Knight ends up being very powerful and throws Jestro and his fake knights for a loop. He's cool and mysterious. But when the fake Knights get the better of him, the REAL NEXO-Knights appear to fend them off and learn their deceptive secret. The Knights save the Black Knight and they open him up to find...young ROBIN! (He used a deep, deceptive voice.) The Knights realize that Robin has potential. But maybe he still has some learning to do.

programme.title: Kate's Island - Episode 8
programme.desc: The five friends leave for science camp that takes place on an island and during the trip, they meet the stand-offish Kate - but they soon realize that there's more to her than meets the eyes and that you shouldn't judge the book by its cover. No one is more excited than Olivia about science camp at a beautiful rocky offshore island with a lighthouse. But Olivia quickly gets off on the wrong foot with a mysterious girl named Kate who seems obsessed with a medallion necklace and the island's rumored history of pirates and treasure. Even worse for Olivia, Kate seems to be growing extra chummy with Mia, even sneaking around the island with her late at night. With the help of Stephanie, Emma and Andrea, Olivia is determined to get to the bottom of the girls' secret friendship and find out once and for all what they're searching for on the island, but they better not let Mrs. Stevens catch them out of their cabin past curfew.

programme.title: The Green Ninja
programme.desc: The ninjas are suspicious when their arch enemy Lord Garmadon moves in to help searching for his missing son Lloyd - but realize they have to work together in their attempt to rescue Lloyd from the snakes inside the unstable Fire Temple that is built on a volcano.

programme.title: The Book Of Total Badness - Episode 109
programme.desc: The NEXO-Knights must fight Jestro's Monsters of Destruction which are attacking all over the Kingdom. But Merlok smells a trap...is he right? In a dark, destroyed part of the kingdom, Jestro arrives at the ruins of a HUGE castle. The Book of Monsters knows this place: the great evil wizard Monstrux lived here. The Book sniffs out some powerful magic in the ruins: "The Book of Destruction." With this, The Book tells Jestro they can destroy the NEXO-Knights and then attack the King's Castle and cause massive destruction. Jestro creates destructive monsters and sends them all over the realm, so the Knights must separate and fight single combats all over the place. The Knights lose these battles (lesson: they have to work as a team!) And, just when the Knights are scattered across the Kingdom, Jestro attacks the King's Castle! It looks like all is lost. When Aaron, who has escaped, returns to see Jestro's attack, he realizes he must gather his fellow Knights. Merlok says it's very dangerous, but Aaron says he must take the risk to gather the Knights and save Knighton.

programme.title: The Grand Hotel - Episode 9
programme.desc: The five friends help out at The Grand Hotel that Andrea's family just bought during what was supposed to be a quiet weekend until a hotel critic arrives unexpectedly. The girls are ready to do everything to make a great impression - but things don't quite go according to plan. Andrea, Stephanie, Olivia, Emma and Mia have come for breakfast at the fanciest hotel in town, now owned by Andrea's family. When Andrea's aunt has to leave town, the girls volunteer to run the hotel for the weekend with the help of quirky Grandma Jean. This is the perfect job for Stephanie's expert managerial skills but then the hotel suddenly fills to capacity with guests, including a hotel critic that can make or break the hotel's reputation! Now the girls find themselves in over their heads juggling reception, childcare, food prep and waitressing, a dog-walking service and a testy chef who quits on them in the middle of dinner. Unfortunately, much of this is their own fault. Can the girls save the Grand Hotel from themselves?

programme.title: All Of Nothing
programme.desc: The ninja and Sensei Wu try to infiltrate the Serpentines' inner sanctum and walk right into a trap, and when Lloyd's rescue mission fails, there is only one person who can help them, namely the evil Lord Garmadon - but can they trust him?

programme.title: The Might And The Magic - Episode 110
programme.desc: Aaron races across the kingdom to gather the NEXO-Knights as Jestro and his Destructive Monsters attack the King's Castle. The Knights must get back to the capitol in time, or Jestro will rule the kingdom! Jestro, while still attacking the King's Castle, has second thoughts until the Book of Monsters orders the mad jester to feed him another magic book he's found (and has been saving.) It's the powerful "Book of Revenge!" Now, combining the powers of Revenge and Destruction, Jestro and his monsters will get their vengeance on King Halbert and the Kingdom of Knighton. Jestro and his monsters lay siege...will they destroy the castle?! Meanwhile, Aaron races across the Kingdom gathering the NEXO-Knights one at a time. As each Knight rejoins the group, they become a more and more powerful team. They even get Robin to join them as the Black Knight in his repaired power suit. Our Knights arrive, finally regrouped, fight off Jestro, save the castle and the King. It's a glorious victory! The King is so pleased after seeing how the brave NEXO-Knights saved his kingdom, he allows Macy to join them as an official NEXO-Knight.

programme.title: The Rise Of The Great Devourer
programme.desc: The ninja haste to the lost city of Ouroboros to try to stop Pythor from awaking The Great Devourer but it is a race against time.

programme.title: Back To School - Episode 201
programme.desc: When the NEXO-Knights are sloppy in a fight with Jestro, Merlok 2.0 sends them back to the Knights' Academy. Not only for a brush-up but to find out what Jestro is after in its hallowed halls. As they Knights battle Jestro - in a somewhat haphazard and lazy way - they discuss the fact that Jestro never wins and that they're always getting over on him. Despite defeating the jerky Jester and his evil Book, Merlok 2.0 discovers that something about the attack on the village is tied to the Knights' Academy. It looks like that's where they'll strike next. It wouldn't hurt for the Knights to go "back to school" to watch for Jestro and for some refresher training. Merlok is sure Jestro wants something at the Academy, but he doesn't know what it is. The Knights are very much "fish out of water" at the academy, even with the "cool kids" - Robin and Ava - showing them around. The next generation of Knights is being taught to integrate the NEXO-Magic of Merlok into their fighting techniques and these kids are good (so good, they initially kick the lazy, know-it-all Knight's butts!) Their old principal, the ever-ornery Headmaster Brickland, sets them straight: they're all still slackers, and they better get their acts together (especially Lance!) The Knights take shifts as "library helpers" much to the delight of the old squirebot librarian, MARGE. They're convinced Jestro is after a book...isn't he always after a book? When Jestro attacks, the Knights help organize the students and there's a big fight in the Academy Library versus Jestro and his Monsters. They drive Jestro off without letting him steal any books! Victory! But as Jestro leaves, we see him holding what the Book of Monsters really wanted: a snow globe with a castle in it that was sitting on the librarian's desk. In the Lava Lands, Jestro throws the snow globe into a volcano and it frees the massive Castle of Monstrux from its snowy magic prison

programme.title: Getting The Message - Episode 11
programme.desc: As the Friends enjoy Heartlake Amusement Park, Emma types a text to Mia, but sends it to Matthew by mistake a text that could be mega-embarrassing for Emma! As her BFF's, the Friends race to find Matthew's phone and erase the text before he reads it. But first, they must brave space rides, dunking booths and worse: the boys locker room! What's more frightening than a roller coaster? More twisted than a funhouse mirror? A text gone wrong! The Friends' fun day at Heartlake Amusement Park turns into a frantic race against time when Emma discovers that her innocent text to Mia was sent to Matthew by mistake -- a text that accidentally sounds like a pledge of Emma's undying love for Matthew! Mega-embarrassing! As Emma's BFF's, the Friends must scramble to retrieve Matthew's phone and erase the text before he reads it. But first, they need to brave space rides, dunking booths, an angry brute and worse - the boys locker room!

programme.title: Day Of The Great Devourer
programme.desc: Disaster threatens as the ninja must fight to defeat the all consuming Great Devourer in a desperate attempt to save Ninjago.

programme.title: Greed Is Good? - Episode 202
programme.desc: When Jestro uses the Book of Greed to rob Auremville of its riches, he also gets Lance's parents as prisoners and these demanding rich folks are too much for even monsters to handle. Jestro's not sure what to do with his new castle in the Lava Lands. "Every castle needs a big chamber filled with treasure" says the Book of Monsters so they've got to go out looting! The BOM convinces Jestro to call forth GENERAL MAGMAR, and Jestro appoints him as "general manager" of "castle operations," much to Magmar's dismay. Meanwhile, Jestro and the BOM find the BOOK OF GREED. This will allow them to make greedy, rapacious monsters that will bring them all the treasure they want to fill their castle! They'll head to the richest town in the realm - AUREMVILLE! Meanwhile, in Auremville, the NEXO-Knights arrive for a huge "Gold is Good" ball at Lance's house. When the Monsters finally arrive in Auremville, a battle breaks out and the greedy monsters make off with everything...including Lance's parents, Goldie and Cuthbert Richmond who are clad in the finest golden garments and so look valuable! Lance will now be forced to live...poor. The Knights have to get his parents back. Meanwhile, his parents - Cuthbert and Goldie Richmond -think their imprisonment in Jestro's gold-filled castle is a "spa holiday" with the worst service. They order Magmar and the monsters around like servants and drive them all crazy. The Knights pile into the Fortrex and head for the Lava Lands, formulating a plan along the way to free Lance's parents. In a village half-way to Jestro's Castle, the Knights run into...Jestro and his monsters headed the other way with Lance's parents and all the gold they've stolen. There's a big fight, until they realize they might have the same goal and decide to deal. The BOM wants to give them back all the gold and Lance's parents. Lance says "No deal." "We'll take the gold, you can keep my parents." It's a weird and comical stand-off. Finally, Clay convinces Lance he has to take his parents back even if they don't always get along (and, it's the only way to get the gold back.)

programme.title: Darkness Shall Rise
programme.desc: Just as the rebuilding effort in Ninjago begins, the four ninjas come to realize that evil has started to resurface with Lord Garmadon forging the ninjas' lost Golden Weapons into a Mega-Weapon with unspeakable powers. With the Devourer destroyed, Ninjago is saved and the rebuilding effort begins. Without their Golden Weapons, the Ninja are stripped of their elemental powers. And with their flying ship 'The Destiny's Bounty' destroyed, the Ninja are forced to find a new home in the city. Meanwhile, Lord Garmadon resurfaces and gains control of the Serpentine as well as transforms the Bounty's wreckage to become 'The Black Bounty'. The Ninja will battle Scales and discover evil has begun to resurface in Ninjago, while Lord Garmadon will successfully forge the Golden Weapons into a Mega-Weapon with unspeakable powers.

programme.title: Sunny Bunnies: Labyrinth / How to Cook a Burger / Strike

This episode introduces the letter F and the words fog, fun, fin and fan.

Wandering through the forest she encounters a series of animals, including a mouse that she befriends. / Bennie Beaver is sent out by his father to collect some wood. But, instead, he returns with a stone that his father is able to use to block up a leak in their home.

programme.title: Counting With Paula: Candy for Thought

programme.title: I like-a-like-a Llama / I am a Robot!
programme.desc: Kooki is a wacky, peppy red panda who LOVES to make things. She babbles away in her own special language, but that’s okay, as each episode is narrated by a special little friend (who also helps translate). Every show has Kooki making two different things - from big, fun cardboard cutout creations to small, delightful handiworks. Whatever she’s doing, she’s always having fun and will inspire kids to unleash the wild side of their creativity.

programme.title: Mama Zila Attacks / Adu Du's Mom

programme.title: Afrina The Chef / Afrinalocks / Afrina And The Space Explorer / Afrina The Grand Dessert Tour
programme.desc: Afrina, is a sweet otter who loves to play dress up and lets her imagination take her away to lands full of amazing adventures. Her friends love to come over for a play and share some of the exciting adventures that happen during Afrina’s Playtime.

programme.title: Roll It / Zoom Zoom

programme.desc: ''Exploring the Oceans of Thailand'' - Host Jeff Corwin travels to the beautiful country of Thailand where he explores the fascinating underwater worlds of the Gulf of Thailand and the Andaman Sea.

programme.title: Ocean Mysteries with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: ''Circle of Life'' - Dive in with host Jeff Corwin as he examines the circle of life in the waters off of Monterey Bay. He'll experience the day in the life of some playful and rambunctious sea lions

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Geo'' - After rescuing, and gaining the trust of, a terrier mix that came from an abusive and neglectful situation, Brandon works hard to prepare the dog for life with a ride-share driver who wants a canine co-pilot to join her on the road.

programme.title: Rock the Park

programme.title: Rock the Park
programme.desc: "Theodore Roosevelt National Park" - Colton and Jack take a walk in the footsteps of America's 26th President, Theodore Roosevelt.

programme.title: The Voyager with Josh Garcia
programme.desc: ''Medieval Magic'' - Dubrovnik, Croatia. Josh ventures into the turquoise waters of the Adriatic.

programme.title: Ocean Mysteries with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: ''Hawaiian Monk Seals'' - Follow host Jeff Corwin as he teams up with a group of dedicated men and women from NOAA to learn more about this native Hawaiian species and how to prevent their extinction.

programme.title: Ocean Mysteries with Jeff Corwin

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Ginger'' - A young Terrier mix might be the best friend a nine-year-old boy has been hoping for. But Brandon is in for a lot of work if he's going to transform this untrained dog into a well-mannered family member that's good with power tools, hoverboards, and cats.

programme.title: Wildlife Savers
programme.desc:
Wildlife Savers is a documentary film about an extraordinary journey: 500 elephants will be moved to a new home in Malawi. This is one of the largest and most significant elephant translocations in human history. Due to poaching, habitat loss and human-wildlife conflict, elephants are being decimated across Africa. 'Wildlife Savers' however, is a different story - one of hope and restoration and of securing the future for Malawi's elephants.
Although Malawi has a relatively peaceful history, the country sees increasing conflict between wildlife and people. Heavily armed poachers are prevalent, harvesting illegal ivory from the remaining elephants, which have been reduced by half from 4,000 to around 2,000 in only twenty years. The "Wildlife Savers" of African Parks resist the onslaught, committing their lives to stemming the violence. What enables them to persevere in their determination to bring about change? Will this, one of the largest elephant relocations in human history, be the solution for elephants and humans in the region?

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction?
programme.desc: In this classic western, Clint Eastwood – aka “Blondie” – saves Eli Wallach from the hangman’s noose three separate times by shooting and severing the rope that he hangs from. We recreate each scene and test the reality of these shots with the weapons that were used.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction?
programme.desc: John McLain (Bruce Willis) finds himself dangling from the side of a building. The only way to save himself is to shoot through the glass window and break through to safety. Using the same Beretta 92 handgun, we reconstruct the office glass and see if our host can break through.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: In this episode, Philippe Cousteau Jr., grandson of legendary explorer Jacques Cousteau, explores the different ways an environmental painter, sculptor, photographer and craftsman blend nature with art.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: In this episode, Cousteau dives off the coast of Australia to explore the Great Barrier Reef. He then heads to James Cook University to get an up-close look at some of the country’s deadliest creatures and visits the National Sea Simulator.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: In this episode, Cousteau travels to New Zealand, where he explores Auckland’s volcanic field and comes face-to-face with one of the largest insects on the planet. We then head to the South Island for a breathtaking helicopter ride.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: In this episode, Cousteau heads to Hawaii to see an incredibly rare waterfall of lava pouring into the ocean. We’ll then visit the Antelope Canyon of Arizona, walk atop a unique frozen lake in Alberta, and take a magical scuba dive in Mexico.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: In this episode, we reveal the winner of our first ever #StudentExplorer Contest. Philippe and the lucky student then head to Mexico to swim with whale sharks in the wild.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: In this episode, we unearthsome of the ways scientists, students and regular citizens are working to save our Earth. From creating “safe havens” for New Zealand’s endangered species, to breeding clownfish in Australia.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: In this episode, Philippe travels to Pennsylvania to explore a hidden wonder beneath the Appalachian Mountains and see how researchers at Carnegie Mellon University are using cutting-edge science to measure air quality in Pittsburgh.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: In this episode, we’ll travel to Yellowstone National Park to learn how rescue dogs can find people caught in an avalanche. From there trips to Hawaii and Utah will see how rangers keep visitors safe from dangerous conditions.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: In this episode, we visit Pennsylvania to see how engineers are using new technology to fast-track the replacement of more than 500 bridges. Then it’s off to New Orleans for a look at the city’s $1.1 billion dollar hurricane protection facility.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: In this episode, Cousteau will travel to Australia to catch the world’s deadliest jellyfish. We’ll also visit California to see how after years on the brink of extinction the California Condor continues to slowly recover.

programme.desc: A classic cult film that features one of the screen's most unlikely pairs. It will defy everything you've ever seen or known about screen lovers.

programme.title: Death on the Nile
programme.desc: Hercule Poirot attempts to solve the murder of a wealthy heiress while taking a pleasure cruise on the Nile River. Based on Agatha Christie's novel.

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard
programme.desc: Intense, enthralling, and unforgettable, Sunset Boulevard stars Gloria Swanson as Norma Desmond, a faded silent-movie star, and William Holden as Joe Gillis, a down-on-his-luck screenwriter whom she enlists to help her make her triumphant return.

programme.title: Murder on the Orient Express
programme.desc: Famous detective Hercule Poirot is on the Orient Express, but the train is caught in the snow. When one of the passengers is discovered murdered, Poirot immediately starts investigating.

programme.title: Grace & Glorie
programme.desc: An emotionally fragile younger woman volunteers to take care of an independent feisty older woman. Stars Gena Rowlands, Diane Lane, Neal McDonough, and Carrie Preston. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: A Painted House
programme.desc: 10-year-old Luke had never kept a secret or told a lie. But when two groups of migrant workers-and two dangerous men-come to work the family's Arkansas cotton farm, mysteries suddenly flood Luke's world.

programme.title: The Lost Child
programme.desc: A story about Rebecca, a woman who goes in search of her natural parents and in the process finds her long lost family and her rich cultural heritage. Stars Mercedes Ruehl and Jamey Sheridan. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame.

programme.title: Rose Hill
programme.desc: In the late 1800s, four young, New York City street kids save an abandoned baby girl and move to Montana to start a new life. Stars Jennifer Garner. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Decoration Day
programme.desc: A grumpy man must rejoin his community when his godchild gets in trouble and a childhood friend refuses to accept a Congressional Medal of Honor for bravery in World War II. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Boy Eats Girl
programme.desc: When your schoolmates develop a taste for human flesh, it pays to know who your friends are.

programme.title: Wall of Secrets
programme.desc: A young couple move into an apartment, only to find they are being monitored by a mysterious stranger.

programme.title: Monsters at Large
programme.desc: A teen task force that fights imaginary monsters finds itself face to face with the real thing.

programme.title: The Gate
programme.desc: A mysterious hole in a suburban backyard leads a couple of boys to a chamber of terrifying demonic evil.

programme.title: Little Monsters
programme.desc: A friendly monster takes young Brian back to his world and teaches him all the secrets of the little monsters.

programme.title: My Friend Dahmer
programme.desc: Disney's Ross Lynch stars as the awkward, adolescent Jeffrey Dahmer - before he became one of America's most infamous serial killers

programme.title: Boa vs. Python
programme.desc: After a genetically altered python escapes, a scientist is enlisted to help kill it by releasing one his giant boa constrictors.

programme.title: Ginger Snaps
programme.desc: Death-obsessed sisters, outcasts in their straight-laced suburb, must deal with the tragic consequences of a werewolf bite in this chilling coming-of-age drama.

programme.title: Howl
programme.desc: Passengers on a train are attacked by a vicious creature out of folklore and must band together to survive.

programme.title: Crocodile
programme.desc: A group of friends goes on a boat trip - but their joyful weekend turns into horror when a giant killer crocodile, searching for its stolen eggs, picks off anyone who gets in its way.

programme.title: The Monster Squad
programme.desc: Young kids form a club that is devoted to monsters, but soon get more than they bargained for when Dracula adjourns to Earth, with Frankenstein's Monster, Wolfman, Mummy, and the Gillman.

programme.title: High Spirits
programme.desc: When a castle-turned-hotel owned by Peter Plunkett falls on hard financial times, he comes up with an idea to turn the place into a tourist attraction by billing it as Europe's most haunted castle.

programme.title: Little Monsters
programme.desc: Maurice, the friendly but wacky monster that lives in the Under the Bed World, takes young Brian (Fred Savage) back to his world and teaches him all the secrets of the little monsters.

programme.title: The Monster Squad
programme.desc: Young kids form a club that is devoted to monsters, but soon get more than they bargained for when Dracula adjourns to Earth, with Frankenstein's Monster, Wolfman, Mummy, and the Gillman.

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: After a car crash, a woman wakes up in a survivalist’s bunker. He claims to have saved her from an apocalyptic attack but, growing suspicious of his motives, she'll have to escape to discover the truth.

programme.title: Rampart
programme.desc: In 1999, Officer Dave Brown (Woody Harrelson), a 24-year veteran of the Los Angeles Police Department, tends to follow his own code of rough justice. A number of years earlier, he was implicated in the death of a serial rapist. Brown's violent tendencies once again land him in hot water when a video of him beating up a suspect plays all over local TV. An assistant DA (Sigourney Weaver) pressures him to retire, but Brown edges closer and closer to a meltdown.

programme.title: Hunter - Season 5
programme.desc: While investigating the apparent suicide of Hunter's friend from the Vietnam War, the pair uncovers a 20-year-old betrayal that is still killing people today.

programme.title: Hunter - Season 5
programme.desc: While investigating the apparent suicide of Hunter's friend from his days in Vietnam, the pair uncovers a 20-year-old betrayal that is still killing people today.

programme.title: Hunter - Season 5
programme.desc: McCall finds her loyalties sharply divided when an important murder case being prosecuted by the Assistant District Attorney, with whom she is in love, is jeopardized by Hunter.

programme.title: Hunter - Season 5
programme.desc: When Hunter confronts the police department to defend the actions of a Chinese-American policewoman critically wounded in the line of duty, the pair heads to Chinatown.

programme.title: Hunter - Season 5
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall try to solve a bank robbery and murder while coping with the double and triple-crossing schemes of a criminal who once saved Hunter's life.

programme.title: Hunter - Season 5
programme.desc: When the husband of a policewoman is murdered, evidence of wife abuse makes Hunter and McCall suspect the woman's patrol partner who knew about the beatings.

programme.title: Hunter - Season 5
programme.desc: A veteran police dispatcher is blackmailed into undermining Hunter's and McCall's investigation of a multimillion-dollar gold robbery when her son is kidnapped.

programme.title: Gotta Groove Records
programme.desc: A short film on the history and resurgence of vinyl records from the perspective of an artist focused pressing plant in Cleveland, Ohio. A hero story about grit, manufacturing and warm tones.

programme.title: Elder
programme.desc: A Mormon missionary finds his world turned upside down when he falls in love with a handsome, Italian Communist. With original 8mm film Tom Clark recounts a love story on the coast of Italy.

programme.title: Bodega De Edgar
programme.desc: The courageous story of Edgar Torres immigrating to the US illegally with his father in the 80’s, becoming a wine expert and starting a winery in Paso Robles, CA to give his children a better future.

programme.title: The Great Invisible
programme.desc: At once a fascinating corporate thriller, a heartbreaking human drama and a peek inside the walls of the secretive oil industry, THE GREAT INVISIBLE is a look at the Deepwater Horizon oil rig explosion through the eyes of those who experienced it first-hand and were then left to pick up the pieces.

programme.title: Meet the Patels
programme.desc: In this real-life "My Big Fat Greek Wedding,” an Indian-American man gets help from his parents and extended family so he can start looking for a wife the traditional Indian way.

programme.title: Armstrong
programme.desc: Interviews and never-before-seen footage highlight the incredible life of astronaut Neil Armstrong -- from his near-death experiences as a fighter pilot and test pilot to his historic Apollo 11 mission as the first man on the moon.

programme.title: Finding Noah
programme.desc: Follow a group of intrepid explorers as they climb and live atop a 17,000 ft mountain in Turkey to determine the final resting place of Noah's Ark. Narrated by Gary Sinise ("Forrest Gump").

programme.title: Fine Lines
programme.desc: There is something far deeper that drives the world's most elite group of mountain adventurers to take life threatening risks while free climbing. At times brutally honest, other times pensive, these 20 legends of the vertical world share stories that reveal the triumph of the human spirit.

programme.title: Imprisoned by Love
programme.desc: Tracie, a devoted wife and mother, lives every day in fear at the hands of her abusive drunk husband Gerald. She does everything in her power to make a lifeless marriage work for the sake of her two loving children Jordan and Brittany. In the process, she almost loses everything. She feels trapped and alone in an abusive marriage that is spiraling into a bottomless abyss. Her friends and family serve as the voices of reason, but will the situation ever change or will Tracie continue to take the abuse and blame.

programme.title: Just A Measure of Faith
programme.desc: Husband Jacob handles all the challenges alone, refusing to allow God to help. His wife, Kayla, a strong believer tries to help overcome both of their problems and lead him in the direction of Faith. With their close knit community along with family, friends and the church, Jacob and Kayla will find the love and support they need.

programme.title: Til Love Comes
programme.desc: After experiencing a devastating breakup, Bass is set up on a series of disastrous dates by his concerned family. However, dating isn't easy and sometimes love hides where you least expect it.

programme.title: Life 101: Angel's Secret
programme.desc: Young, beautiful, and naive Angel soon realizes that sometimes the most dangerous place to be is in the bed of a lover. After one night with her boyfriend Angel is quickly caught in a whirlwind of uncontrollable events and unforeseeable consequences. As family and friends gather to support her, will she be able to share the truth before it is too late?

programme.title: Let Go & Let God
programme.desc: Let Go and Let God follows two people from vastly different worlds whose lives are rocked after experiencing sudden deaths in their family. They question God as a result, but find the faith they're looking for on an unexpected path.

programme.title: Invisible Lies
programme.desc: A Black lawyer must come to grip with his prejudices after falling in love with a White woman while simultaneously defending a Black teenager who has been wrongfully accused of drugging and raping his White girlfriend.

programme.title: The Baron And The Kid
programme.desc: Johnny Cash, Greg Webb, Tracy Pollan William “The Baron” Addington (Johnny Cash) is a former pool pro whose lifetime of boozing has cost him his career and family. In an attempt to straighten out his life, he quits drinking and plays pool only for charity.

programme.title: Dinotopia, Ep. 1
programme.desc: Erik von Detten, Shiloh Strong, Michael Brandon, Georgina Rylance, Sophie Ward, Lisa Zane, Jonathan Hyde Castaways in time find themselves stranded on the shores of a prehistoric Eden where dinosaurs and humans co-exist in peace and harmony

programme.title: Dinotopia, Ep. 2
programme.desc: Erik von Detten, Shiloh Strong, Michael Brandon, Georgina Rylance, Sophie Ward, Lisa Zane, Jonathan Hyde Castaways in time find themselves stranded on the shores of a prehistoric Eden where dinosaurs and humans co-exist in peace and harmony

programme.title: Dinotopia, Ep. 3
programme.desc: Erik von Detten, Shiloh Strong, Michael Brandon, Georgina Rylance, Sophie Ward, Lisa Zane, Jonathan Hyde Castaways in time find themselves stranded on the shores of a prehistoric Eden where dinosaurs and humans co-exist in peace and harmony

programme.title: Jules Verne's Mysterious Island, Ep. 1
programme.desc: Kyle MacLachlan, Patrick Stewart, Gabrielle Anwar, Omar Gooding, Jason Durr, Danielle Calvert, Roy Marsden Escaping from a Confederate prison camp by balloon, five survivors land on an uncharted island in the Pacific. Far from a sanctuary, the island is home to carnivorous monsters, bloodthirsty pirates, and the mad genius, Captain Nemo, who inhabits the mysterious island for his own strange ends.

programme.title: Milius
programme.desc: The life story of controversial film director John Milius. Featuring interviews with Steven Spielberg, George Lucas, Arnold Schwarzenegger, Francis Ford Coppola, Kathleen Kennedy, Harrison Ford, Robert Zemeckis, Oliver Stone and many more.

programme.title: The Rainbow Bridge Motel
programme.desc: After reserving an all-inclusive wedding package at Niagara Falls, Dean & Darren learn they've booked themselves in a run-down motor lodge sandwiched between two chemical plants run by some guy named Shibbawitz and a Burmese refugee family.

programme.title: High Fantasy
programme.desc: A group of friends camping in the South African countryside wake up to discover they've all swapped bodies. Stranded in the wilderness, they'll have to navigate a personal-political labyrinth if their lives are ever to be the same again.

programme.title: Freaks & Errors: A Rare Collection
programme.desc: Obsession, love, money & postage. Freaks & errors: A Rare Collection, is a documentary film that reveals the rarely seen, often eccentric and surprisingly large world of stamp collecting. Interviews with columnist and author Neil Steinberg, footwear guru Stuart Weitzman and bond king William H. Gross, in addition to an enthusiastic collection of life-long, stamp hobbyists, the film is a commentary on how we're all searching for ways to control our world, make order out of chaos, connect with one another, and express ourselves through our hobbies.

programme.title: Kim Swims
programme.desc: The inspiring story of an accomplished open water swimmer's attempt to become the first woman to swim 30 miles through a stretch of cold, rough and shark-inhabited waters near the San Francisco coast.

programme.title: To Sleep With Anger
programme.desc: A charming soouthern drifter visits an old friend in L.A., but stirs up trouble with his friend's family.

programme.title: Suspect
programme.desc: A public defender pokes into places she shouldn't while trying to exonerate an innocent man accused of murder. Edited for TV

programme.title: The Principal
programme.desc: At the toughest high school in town, the biggest troublemaker is the principal. Edited for TV

programme.title: No Mercy
programme.desc: A big-city cop follows a gorgeous blond to New Orleans to avenge the murder of his partner. Edited for TV

programme.title: Terror Among Us
programme.desc: A police sergeant and a parole officer endeavor to stop a rapist-on-parole before he can follow through his threats on five women whom testified against him years earlier.

programme.title: Gunmen From Laredo
programme.desc: A jailed rancher escapes to track down the outlaws who framed him for a murder he didn't commit.

programme.title: Bonanza Town
programme.desc: When government agent, Charles Starrett as Steve Ramsey/the Durango Kid, hears that a wanted criminal is in town, he seeks the aid of Smiley Burnette. Together they track down and kill the head of the crooked gang which has been running the town.

programme.title: The Rough, Tough West
programme.desc: Steve Reynolds aka The Durango Kid, helps out a group of miners who are being forced to pay the greedy Mahoney to travel across his land, which he has acquired illegally. Reynolds enlists the aid of his alter ego, "The Durango Kid," and ends Mahoney's evil reign.

programme.title: Three Hours To Kill
programme.desc: A wrongly accused cowboy saved from hanging is set free to hunt the real killer of his fiancee.

programme.title: Reprisal!
programme.desc: A Native American passing as white squares off against a bigoted ranching family on the Oklahoma frontier.

programme.title: Tulsa
programme.desc: After a rancher dies during a feud with a major oil company, his daughter starts digging for oil herself.

programme.title: The Last Rebel
programme.desc: A rebellious man and his partner, raise a ruckus in a small town after they rescue a man from a lynching.

programme.title: Support Your Local Sheriff!
programme.desc: James Garner stars in this rollicking western spoof that has him taking on the job of a frontier town sheriff who must fend off villains (led by Walter Brennen) from every direction...all without breaking a sweat or dirtying his shiny black boots!

programme.title: Union Bound
programme.desc: Sargent Hoover went to war to preserve the Union. After being captured and sent to a prisoner of war camp, he understood what it was to be kept against his will. Together with a friend he escaped and aided by slaves made it to freedom.

programme.title: Sodbusters
programme.desc: In this parody of western tropes, a mysterious stranger (Oscar nominee Kris Kristofferson, “Blade”) rolls into town to help local farmers defend their property from a land-grabbing cattle rancher.

programme.title: One Eyed Jacks
programme.desc: Marlon Brando’s only time as a director, Rio (Marlon Brando) also called "The Kid", his mentor Dad Longworth (Karl Malden), & a third man called Doc, rob a bank of two saddlebags of gold in Sonora, Mexico.

programme.desc: Major Fletcher asks Earp to help transport a $15,000 payroll to the Army fort by way of a stagecoach.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Wells Fargo asks Earp to help them solve the problem of silver ingots being stolen due to constant thefts on a 30 mile run.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Dick Gird has hired Irish and Welsh miners but the old country feud between the two groups creates tension.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: During the holdup of a stage, gang leader Tinkham Brown is wounded. Earp wants Doc Goodfellow to tell Earp if the outlaws come after him but Doc Goodfellow refuses.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Earp must contend with Capt. Rowland who runs his own legal system on his property including a jail.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: An Army scout returns to Tombstone and finds his wife killed by the Apaches in retribution for his attacks.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Billy Clanton arrives home unexpectedly from school in San Antonio. Emma wants Old Man Clanton to send him back to school but Billy and his brothers Phin and Ike have other ideas.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: With several hundred Chinese in Tombstone, resentment brews among them about their treatment.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Earp learns Old Man Clanton is moving some of his stolen silver. Earp catches two of the gang and some silver but Sheriff Behan releases the men saying they escaped.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
